fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.text: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency. Drama

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.text: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son. Crime, Drama

fields.title: The Dark Knight

fields.title: The Godfather: Part II

fields.title: 12 Angry Men

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

fields.title: Pulp Fiction

fields.title: Schindler's List

fields.title: Inception

fields.title: Fight Club

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

fields.title: Forrest Gump

fields.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

fields.title: The Matrix

fields.title: Goodfellas

fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

fields.title: Hamilton

fields.title: Gisaengchung

fields.title: Interstellar

fields.title: Cidade de Deus

fields.title: Star Wars

fields.title: The Prestige

fields.title: The Departed

fields.title: The Pianist

fields.title: Gladiator

fields.title: American History X

fields.title: Hotaru no haka

fields.title: Psycho

fields.title: City Lights

fields.title: Ayla: The Daughter of War

fields.title: WALL·E

fields.title: Paths of Glory

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap. Drama, Thriller, War

fields.title: A Clockwork Orange

fields.title: Talvar

fields.title: Drishyam

fields.text: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
fields.text: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past. Action, Adventure, Family
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C. Action, Drama

fields.title: Match Point
fields.text: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law. Drama, Romance, Thriller

fields.title: Watchmen
fields.text: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it. Action, Drama, Mystery

fields.title: Lord of War
fields.text: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent. Action, Crime, Drama

fields.title: Saw
fields.text: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer. Horror, Mystery, Thriller

fields.title: Synecdoche, New York
fields.text: A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play. Drama

fields.title: Mysterious Skin
fields.text: A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth. Drama

fields.title: Jeux d'enfants
fields.text: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another. Comedy, Drama, Romance

fields.title: Un long dimanche de fiançailles
fields.text: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One. Drama, Mystery, Romance

fields.title: The Station Agent
fields.text: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss. Comedy, Drama

fields.title: 21 Grams
fields.text: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: Boksuneun naui geot
fields.text: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: Finding Neverland
fields.text: The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan. Biography, Drama, Family

fields.title: 25th Hour
fields.text: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term. Drama

fields.title: The Butterfly Effect
fields.text: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal. Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller

fields.title: 28 Days Later...
fields.text: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary. Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi

fields.title: Batoru rowaiaru
fields.text: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act. Action, Adventure, Drama

fields.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
fields.text: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons. Comedy, Drama

fields.title: Y tu mamá también
fields.text: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other. Drama

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
fields.text: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world. Adventure, Family, Fantasy

fields.title: The Others
fields.text: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted. Horror, Mystery, Thriller

fields.title: Blow
fields.text: The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States. Biography, Crime, Drama

fields.title: Enemy at the Gates
fields.text: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad. Drama, History, War

fields.title: Minority Report
fields.text: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder. Action, Crime, Mystery

fields.title: The Hurricane
fields.text: The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence. Biography, Drama, Sport

fields.title: American Psycho
fields.text: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies. Comedy, Crime, Drama

fields.title: Lola rennt
fields.text: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: The Thin Red Line
fields.text: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War. Drama, War

fields.title: Mulan
fields.text: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process. Animation, Adventure, Family

fields.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
fields.text: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades. Adventure, Comedy, Drama

fields.title: Funny Games
fields.text: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: Dark City
fields.text: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from. Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller

fields.title: Sleepers
fields.text: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: Lost Highway
fields.text: Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray. Mystery, Thriller

fields.title: Sense and Sensibility
fields.text: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites. Drama, Romance

fields.title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
fields.text: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building. Action, Adventure, Thriller

fields.title: Dead Man
fields.text: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world. Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

fields.title: The Bridges of Madison County
fields.text: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s. Drama, Romance

fields.title: Apollo 13
fields.text: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy. Adventure, Drama, History

fields.title: Trois couleurs: Blanc
fields.text: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her. Comedy, Drama, Romance

fields.title: Falling Down
fields.text: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them. Action, Crime, Drama

fields.title: Dazed and Confused
fields.text: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976. Comedy

fields.title: My Cousin Vinny
fields.text: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience. Comedy, Crime

fields.title: Omohide poro poro
fields.text: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo. Animation, Drama, Romance

fields.title: Delicatessen
fields.text: Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants. Comedy, Crime

fields.title: Home Alone
fields.text: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation. Comedy, Family

fields.title: The Godfather: Part III
fields.text: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire. Crime, Drama

fields.title: When Harry Met Sally...
fields.text: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship. Comedy, Drama, Romance

fields.title: The Little Mermaid
fields.text: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love. Animation, Family, Fantasy

fields.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
fields.text: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II. Comedy, Crime

fields.title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
fields.text: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with a lovable oaf of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion. Comedy, Drama

fields.title: Lethal Weapon
fields.text: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers. Action, Crime, Thriller

fields.title: Blood Simple
fields.text: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered. Crime, Drama, Thriller

fields.title: On Golden Pond
fields.text: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms. Drama

fields.title: Mad Max 2
fields.text: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits. Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi

fields.title: The Warriors
fields.text: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down. Action, Crime, Thriller

fields.title: The Muppet Movie
fields.text: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit. Adventure, Comedy, Family

fields.title: Escape from Alcatraz
fields.text: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world. Action, Biography, Crime

fields.title: Watership Down
fields.text: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren. Animation, Adventure, Drama

fields.title: Midnight Express
fields.text: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison. Biography, Crime, Drama

fields.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
fields.text: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO. Drama, Sci-Fi

fields.title: The Long Goodbye
fields.text: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder. Comedy, Crime, Drama

fields.title: Giù la testa
fields.text: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution. Drama, War, Western

fields.title: Kelly's Heroes
fields.text: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure. Adventure, Comedy, War

fields.title: The Jungle Book
fields.text: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization. Animation, Adventure, Family

fields.title: Blowup
fields.text: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park. Drama, Mystery, Thriller

fields.title: A Hard Day's Night
fields.text: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live television performance. Comedy, Music, Musical

fields.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
fields.text: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way. Comedy, Drama, Romance

fields.title: Giant
fields.text: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates. Drama, Western

fields.title: From Here to Eternity
fields.text: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love. Drama, Romance, War

fields.title: Lifeboat
fields.text: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship. Drama, War

fields.title: The 39 Steps
fields.text: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information. Crime, Mystery, Thriller
